thread.section_title: Hotel de l'Europe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A little gem!
thread.title_full: A little gem! - Review of Hotel de l'Europe, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lollypops400
title: A little gem!
text: A real little gem, centrally located. Excellent value, spotlessly clean, all the staff were helpful and very friendly. The wifi was terrific. We were facing onto the street which we thought might be an issue with noise, once the windows were closed at a night we heard nothing bar an odd siren and we heard no noise from the adjoining room or on the corridors. Beds were very comfy. Excellent shower if only a bit small. Would stay here again next time Iâ€™m in Paris and definitely would recommend to others!
